title: Ham and Broccoli Biscuit Bake Recipe
directions: Preheat oven to 350Â°. Combine broccoli, soup, 3/4 cup milk and seasonings in a large saucepan; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; add the ham and cheese. Cook and stir until cheese is melted. Pour into a greased 11x7-in. baking dish.
Combine biscuit mix, egg and remaining milk in a small bowl just until moistened. Drop by tablespoonfuls over ham mixture; spread gently.
Bake, uncovered, 25-30 minutes or until golden brown. Yield: 6 servings.
ingredients: 1 can (10-3/4 ounces) condensed cream of potato soup, undiluted
1 cup (4 ounces) shredded cheddar-Monterey Jack cheese
